title: Start
body:
Mia: This barrel should work.
<<moveToY Mia Barrel1 -20 60>>
<<moveToX Mia Barrel1 15 60>>
<<moveToY Mia Barrel1 0 60>>
<<moveToX Mia Barrel1 5 60>>
<<disableCollisions Barrel1>>
<<attachTo Barrel1 Mia>>
<<pauseFor Mia 1.0>>
<<moveLeft Mia 165 30>>
Mia: Ok, let's try this.
<<detachFrom Barrel1 Mia>>
<<enableCollisions Barrel1>>
<<disableCollisions Renata>>
[[TryClimb]]

title: TryClimb
body:
<<disableCollisions Mia>>
<<detachFrom Renata Mia>>
<<moveToY Mia Barrel1 -15 60>>
<<moveToX Mia Barrel1 0 60>>
<<moveToY Mia Barrel1 -5 60>>
<<pauseFor Mia 1.0>>
<<moveUp Mia 25 60>>
Mia: Just...can't...reach it....
<<moveDown Mia 25 60>>
Renata: What do we do?
<<enableCollisions Mia>>
<<enableCollisions Renata>>
<<attachTo Renata Mia>>
[[end]]
